com.ipt.ebsa.manage.hiera

Class HieraEnvironmentStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.hiera.HieraEnvironmentStateManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentStateManager

    public class HieraEnvironmentStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnvironmentStateManager
    An implementation of EnvironmentStateManager which uses Hiera as its source of information Based on the original HieraData class
